code: import React from"react";import{useDispatch,useSelector}from"react-redux";import{incrementCell,resetNearestIds,setNearestIds}from"../../../../../../redux/actions";var IncrementCell=function IncrementCell(_ref){var id=_ref.id,value=_ref.value;var nearestIds=useSelector(function(state){return state.matrix.nearestIds;});var dispatch=useDispatch();var isSameValue=!!nearestIds.sameValueIds.find(function(sameValueId){return sameValueId===id;});var isNearestValue=!!nearestIds.ids.find(function(nearestId){return nearestId===id;});var className=isSameValue?"same-value":isNearestValue?"nearest-value":null;return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("td",{className:className},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{onMouseEnter:function onMouseEnter(){return dispatch(setNearestIds(id));},onMouseLeave:function onMouseLeave(){return dispatch(resetNearestIds());},onClick:function onClick(){return dispatch(incrementCell(id,value));}},value));};export default IncrementCell;
